message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, it's a fair and simple proposal.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not willing to give away too much. I think I deserve a bigger portion for being more patient.
You're being too greedy, I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. I'll give you a bit more, but not too much.
You're not being flexible enough, I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I'm not going to give up my majority stake.
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to give up.
You're running out of time, I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to let you get the best of me.
I'm almost out of time, but I'm not going to give up. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve more.
You're running out of time, I'll give you almost nothing, but I'm not going to let you get the last laugh.
I'm out of options, but I'm not going to give up completely. I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going to let you get everything.
You're out of time, I'm taking it all. Better luck next time.
